title: Scheffler wins PGA for third major as Rahm fades
description: Scottie Scheffler, whose three-shot lead was erased during the final round, held steady to win the PGA Championship by five shots as Jon Rahm stumbled down the stretch.
author: Mark Schlabach

title: OKC overcomes tough Nuggets test to make WCF
description: The Oklahoma City Thunder rolled into the Western Conference finals after beating the Nuggets 125-93 in Game 7 on Sunday.

title: Lineker expected to leave the BBC
description: It comes after he faced criticism for sharing a social media post about Zionism.

title: Five teams, three spots - which way will race for Champions League go?
description: Five teams into three places don't go - so who will qualify for the Champions League as the Premier League's race for Europe enters its final week?

title: Verstappen wins Imola thriller as Norris beats Piastri to second
description: Max Verstappen produced a faultless drive to claim victory in a chaotic Emilia Romagna Grand Prix as Lando Norris beat McLaren team-mate Oscar Piastri to second.

title: Scheffler blows big lead before storming to victory in major thriller
description: Scottie Scheffler recovered from blowing a five-shot lead and withstood a final-round charge from Jon Rahm to cruise to an impressive major victory at the PGA Championship.

description: We've got two massive MLS games this Sunday evening, as Orlando City travel to take on a slumping Inter Miami, while the two Los Angeles rivals square off for the first time this season.Â Here is what...

title: Scottie Schefflers reveals he, too, failed driver test before PGA victory
description: Scheffler's driver failed a CT test administered by the USGA earlier this week at Quail Hollow.
